trans-unit.source: Defines an interest in specific workflow status events that occur in a root workflow instance; used for matching by a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint" /> in a tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: Define um interesse em eventos de status do fluxo de trabalho específicos que ocorrem em uma instância de fluxo de trabalho raiz. Usado para correspondência por um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint" /> em um perfil de acompanhamento.
Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Whenever the status of the workflow instance changes, the workflow instance emits a workflow status event based on one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Sempre que altera o status da instância do fluxo de trabalho, a instância de fluxo de trabalho emite um evento de status do fluxo de trabalho com base em um do <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> valores para o infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> expresses an interest in locations of the workflow instance where specific types of workflow status events occur.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> expressa interesse em locais da instância do fluxo de trabalho onde ocorrem a tipos específicos de eventos de status do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation.Events%2A> to specify the workflow status events to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> valores <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation.Events%2A> para especificar os eventos de status do fluxo de trabalho a ser correspondido.

trans-unit.source: A single <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> may refer to more than one actual location in the potential execution path of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Um único <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> podem se referir a mais de um local real no caminho de execução potencial de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: You can add a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> in order to define the match parameters for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar uma <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para definir os parâmetros de correspondência para um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation" />.

trans-unit.source: No workflow status events to match are specified.
trans-unit.target: Nenhum evento de status do fluxo de trabalho para corresponder é especificado.

trans-unit.source: You must add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation.Events%2A> for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> to match any workflow status events.
trans-unit.target: Você deve adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> valores <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation.Events%2A> para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> para corresponder a qualquer evento de status do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: IList of tracking workflow events to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Lista de eventos do fluxo de trabalho de acompanhamento a ser correspondida.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation" /> class that matches the specified tracking workflow events.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation" /> que corresponde aos eventos do fluxo de trabalho de acompanhamento especificados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of workflow status events that will be matched for this location.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a lista de eventos de status do fluxo de trabalho que será correspondida para esse local.

trans-unit.source: A list of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent" /> values that specifies the workflow status events for which the location will be matched.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent" /> valores que especifica os eventos de status do fluxo de trabalho para o qual o local será correspondido.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty list.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma lista vazia.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation.Events%2A> contains the list of workflow status events for which this <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> will be matched.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation.Events%2A> contém a lista de eventos de status do fluxo de trabalho para o qual o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> será correspondido.

trans-unit.source: You can track the specified workflow status events by adding the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A> in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> that is part of a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode controlar os eventos de status do fluxo de trabalho especificado ao adicionar o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A> em uma <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> que faz parte de um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
